query: SELECT pf.id, pf.productId, f.name as flavor_name, pf.additionalPrice FROM product_flavors pf JOIN flavors f ON pf.flavorId = f.id WHERE pf.productId = 30003;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2ybigjze5zrQRNb.root --database mAyHYydgnUj6kaCQZYvmfs --execute SELECT pf.id, pf.productId, f.name as flavor_name, pf.additionalPrice FROM product_flavors pf JOIN flavors f ON pf.flavorId = f.id WHERE pf.productId = 30003;
